Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Le Grand Bleu Hotel in Trou aux Biches, you'll be close to Trou aux Biches Beach and Grand Bay Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Mont Choisy Beach and Maheswarnath.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).



Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies.

With a stay at Le Grand Bleu Hotel in Trou aux Biches, you'll be close to Trou aux Biches Beach and Grand Bay Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Mont Choisy Beach and Maheswarnath.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Trou aux Biches Beach - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Mont Choisy Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Maheswarnath - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Blue Water Diving Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Canonnier Beach - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
La Croisette - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Grand Bay Beach - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Grand Bay Shopping Center - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Merville Beach - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Mauritius Aquarium - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Pereybere Beach - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Bain Boeuf Beach - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Turtle Bay Marine Park - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Sugar Factory - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Cap Malheureux Beach - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi

The preferred airport for Le Grand Bleu Hotel is Mahebourg (MRU-Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam Intl.) - 47 km / 29.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
